= LASTSAVE =
 Return the UNIX TIME of the last DB save executed with success.
 A client may check if a [BgsaveCommand BGSAVE] command succeeded reading the LASTSAVE
 value, then issuing a [BgsaveCommand BGSAVE] command and checking at regular intervals
 every N seconds if LASTSAVE changed.

== Return value ==

[ReplyTypes Integer reply], specifically an UNIX time stamp.

== See also ==
 * [BgsaveCommand BGSAVE]
